duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide Telemedicine Medical Treatment services via video visits for adults and/or children with ADHD and other behavioral health conditions.
Complete patient related tasks including prescription refills, patient questions/concerns, and compliance with employment laws and regulations.
Maintain knowledge of trends, best practices, and telemedicine regulatory changes.
Complete any other tasks and functions as requested by the company.

education_certification.credential: Doctor of Medicine (MD) or Osteopathy (DO) Required
Completion of Residency Program in either Internal or Family Medicine
DEA license(s) and controlled substance license(s), if applicable
